fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Bake bread numerous (3) times.
Distribute your bread to players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Your bread will allow the receivers of the bread to use their nightly abilities on TWO targets INSTEAD of just one. Unless they aren't on your team, instead they get ROLEBLOCKED.
If the everfrost is in the game then you're one of them actually.
